SELECT ROWNUM, X.* FROM (SELECT POST_NO, CATEGORY_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, WRITER, CREATE_DATE, READ_COUNT FROM NOTICE N JOIN MEMBER M ON (MEMBER_NIC = WRITER) WHERE M.STATUS = 'N' AND N.STATUS = 'N' AND CATEGORY_NO = '2' AND MEMBER_LEVEL = 10 ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC, POST_NO DESC) X WHERE ROWNUM <= 3
UNION ALL
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT POST_NO, CATEGORY_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, WRITER, CREATE_DATE, READ_COUNT FROM NOTICE N JOIN MEMBER M ON (MEMBER_NIC = WRITER) WHERE M.STATUS = 'N' AND N.STATUS = 'N' AND CATEGORY_NO = '1' AND MEMBER_LEVEL = 10 AND $ LIKE ? ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC, POST_NO DESC) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
UPDATE NOTICE SET READ_COUNT = READ_COUNT + 1 WHERE POST_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'N'
SELECT POST_NO, CATEGORY_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, WRITER, CREATE_DATE FROM NOTICE N JOIN MEMBER M ON (MEMBER_NIC = WRITER) WHERE POST_NO = ? AND N.STATUS = 'N'
INSERT INTO NOTICE ( BOARD_NO, POST_NO, CATEGORY_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, WRITER ) VALUES ( 2, SEQ_NNO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ? )
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT ( PHOTO_NO, BOARD_NO, POST_NO, ORIGIN_NAME, NEW_NAME, PATH, FILE_LEVEL) VALUES (SEQ_FNO.NEXTVAL, 2, SEQ_NNO.CURRVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?)
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT (PHOTO_NO, BOARD_NO, POST_NO, ORIGIN_NAME, NEW_NAME, PATH, FILE_LEVEL) VALUES (SEQ_FNO.NEXTVAL, 2, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
UPDATE NOTICE SET NOTICE_TITLE = ?, NOTICE_CONTENT = ?, CATEGORY_NO = ? WHERE POST_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'N'
UPDATE NOTICE SET STATUS = 'Y' WHERE POST_NO = ?
UPDATE ATTACHMENT SET STATUS = 'Y' WHERE POST_NO = ?
SELECT PHOTO_NO, ORIGIN_NAME, NEW_NAME, PATH, FILE_LEVEL FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE BOARD_NO = 2 AND POST_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'N'
UPDATE ATTACHMENT SET ORIGIN_NAME = ?, NEW_NAME = ?, PATH = ?, UPLOAD_DATE = SYSDATE, FILE_LEVEL = ? WHERE PHOTO_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM NOTICE N JOIN MEMBER M ON (MEMBER_NIC = WRITER) WHERE M.STATUS = 'N' AND N.STATUS = 'N' AND CATEGORY_NO = '1' AND MEMBER_LEVEL = 10
